body_text:
Where did the Dog-people come from? In Dragon-ball there are numerous dog-people, one of which is the king of the world

There were other dog-people in the anime episode Plight of the children.  One of the orphans was a dog person, and one of the police was a dog person.
Where did they all come from?  Did someone, one day, breed with a dog, thus spawning this race of Dog-people?

What happened to all the talking animals in Dragon Ball? I remember Dragon Ball used to have lots of talking, humanoid foxes and the like. Then suddenly, in Dragon Ball Z, the only talking animals I remember are Oolong and Puar. 
Is there any explanation for this or is it just a case of author discontinuing an idea?
